articles.author: Anita McSorley
articles.title: Lidl issues urgent recall of popular ham that may be unsafe for some Irish shoppers - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The Food Safety Authority of Ireland has issued an advisory about certain batches of Lidl's Glensallagh Glazed and Grilled American Style Cajun Shaved Ham
articles.content:
An alert has been issued to Lidl shoppers in Ireland over a popular ham product that could be unsafe for some consumers.

articles.title: Gauff appeals for end to gun violence after advancing to French Open final - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: American teen Coco Gauff will take to centre court for the women’s final at Roland Garros knowing there are things far more important than a maiden grand slam crown.
articles.content:
Paris: American teenager Coco Gauff has appealed for an end to gun violence in the United States after she beat Italian Martina Trevisan to reach the French Open final.
